children.text: So take a moment and let that sinking in we know so little that we understand 0% of what there is to know.  And no matter how much you learn that is always an
amount more that you don't know.
Ok glad you let that sink in because it is about to get worse.

So if our understanding is already 0 how can it get worse? Well enter hour good friend time which take everything we know and roll dice to make sure some of that stuff goes from know things to unknown things.
But if I know nothing how can I ever make a decision?

Let's just attack the denominator, if I just assume somethings that will lower the "Thing to Know" small enough that I might be able to know something.  We often do this when we want to estimate something.
